channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Italy Says Cecilia Sala, Journalist Detained by Iran, Has Been Released
item.description: Cecilia Sala, 29, was detained last month while on a reporting trip. She had been held for 20 days and told her family that she was kept in isolation.

item.title: The Surgeon General says he’s ‘deeply disturbed’ after talking to Americans. These 3 factors could help
item.description: “As I finish my tenure as Surgeon General, this is my parting prescription, my final wish for all of us: Choose community.”

item.title: Coinbase scores win against SEC as judge agrees to escalate dispute over crypto security definition
item.description: Coinbase and the SEC have been locked in legal proceedings about whether the crypto exchange is violating securities laws.

item.title: Trump’s Threat to Take Over Greenland Bewilders the Island’s Population
item.description: After Donald Trump suggested he might take over Greenland by force, the consensus among the island’s population appears to be bewilderment and anxiety...

item.title: Members of Congress again outperformed the stock market, report shows
item.description: "When Congress members consistently outperform benchmarks like the S&P 500, it raises serious questions about fairness."

item.title: Belgium’s Food Agency Advises Against Eating Your Christmas Tree
item.description: The country’s food agency warned against using evergreens in food after the city of Ghent suggested an unusual form of recycling: spruce needle butter...

item.title: Ukraine Strikes Oil Depot Near Russian Air Base, Ukrainian Military Says
item.description: The attack was the latest effort to inflict pain on Russia even as Kyiv is losing ground on the battlefield at home.

item.title: Israeli Strike in West Bank Kills 3, Including Children, Official Says
item.description: Violence has escalated in the occupied territory over the last year and a half, as Israel conducts raids targeting armed fighters with Hamas and Pales...

item.title: Bitcoin Is Luring More Companies and Their Cash
item.description: It is a sharp pivot away from the cautious approach of the traditional corporate treasury, normally charged with safeguarding cash rather than chasing...

item.title: Trump Asks Supreme Court to Halt Sentencing in N.Y. Hush-Money Case
item.description: Prosecutors have been ordered to respond to the president-elect’s request by Thursday morning, suggesting the court could rule before Friday’s schedul...

item.title: Many Pay Their Respects to Jimmy Carter in the Georgia Cold
item.description: It was a once-in-a-lifetime chance to pay their respects to a president. They were not going to miss it, even if meant waking up in the middle of the ...

item.title: This year is your last chance to get these two types of Girl Scout cookies
item.description: Last year’s retired flavor saw eBay sellers asking up to $50 per box.

item.title: Experts say extreme winter conditions are exerting pressure on agriculture ‘in ways we haven’t seen for a very, very long time’
item.description: A nasty dose of winter weather has pummeled much of the U.S. from Kansas to the East Coast.
